item.title: APU External Control System – APU automatic fire extinguishing system operative

remarks.para: May be inoperative and APU used, provided an APU automatic fire extinguishing system is installed and verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard APU Control Panel "APU EXTERNAL CONTROL SYSTEM INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: On the flight deck from the Aft Electronics panel (P8) perform a FIRE/OVHT TEST by pushing the ENG/APU/CARGO switch. The fire bell will ring intermittently. Observe the following lights illuminate:
On the flight deck from the Accessory Panel, push the SQUIB TEST switch. Observe the APU squib light illuminates green.
